[60FPS (Hold Select button for 30FPS)]
D3000000 00000000
08003204 42700000
08003208 3F800000
DD000000 00000004
08003204 41F00000
08003208 40000000
D0000000 00000000
{Tested on 3DS Sys. 11.6.0-39U .
Codes by @Hazerou}

[++FPS++]

[60FPS]
08003204 42700000
08003208 3F800000
{Tested on 3DS Sys. 11.6.0-39U .
Codes by @Hazerou}

[30FPS]
08003204 41F00000
08003208 40000000
{Tested on 3DS Sys. 11.6.0-39U .
Codes by @Hazerou}

[--]
